result.markdown: --- title: "Week 3: R package development" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Main reference * [*R Packages (2e)*](https://r-pkgs.org) ## What you will learn this week * Package metadata * Package documentation * Package checks and tests * Package website * Continuous integration via GitHub Actions ## Slides for week Download pdf ## Assignments * [Assignment 1](../assignments/A1.qmd) is due on Friday 21 March.
